mutants.code:
def max_common_letters(N: int, S: str) -> int:
    ans = 1
    for i in range(1, N):
        X = S[:i]
        Y = S[i:]
        common_letters = set(X) & set(Y)
        ans = max(ans, len(common_letters))
    return ans

def max_common_letters(N: int, S: str) -> int:
    ans = -1
    for i in range(1, N):
        X = S[:i]
        Y = S[i:]
        common_letters = set(X) & set(Y)
        ans = max(ans, len(common_letters))
    return ans

def max_common_letters(N: int, S: str) -> int:
    ans = 0
    for i in range(-1, N):
        X = S[:i]
        Y = S[i:]
        common_letters = set(X) & set(Y)
        ans = max(ans, len(common_letters))
    return ans

def max_common_letters(N: int, S: str) -> int:
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, N):
        X = S[:i]
        Y = S[i:]
        common_letters = set(X) | set(Y)
        ans = max(ans, len(common_letters))
    return ans
